text.text_translated:
A hula hoop is a big plastic ring you can play with. Summits are the tops of very high mountains.

Wasfia Nazreen is from Bangladesh. When she was a young girl, she saw a child from another country playing with a hula hoop. Wasfia wanted to play, but she could not. In her country, people thought girls should not play with hula hoops or ride bikes.

Now, Wasfia is a famous woman. She climbed the Seven Summits. These are very high mountains, like Everest and Kilimanjaro. Not many people can do this.

Wasfia did something special. She was the first person to play with a hula hoop on top of each summit. She did this for an important reason. In her country, some people say girls should not do sport. She wanted to help women and girls feel strong and do sports.
